edu.nd.darts.cimon
Class MetricService<T extends Comparable<T>>

java.lang.Object
  edu.nd.darts.cimon.MetricService<T>
Type Parameters:
T - value type for metrics monitored (typically subclass of Number)
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObservableUpdate
Direct Known Subclasses:
AccelerometerService, BatteryService, BrowserHistoryService, CpuService, CpuUtilService, FileAccessService, GyroscopeService, HumidityService, InstructionCntService, KeyboardService, LightService, LinearAccelService, LocationService, MagnetometerService, MemoryService, MMSService, NetBytesService, NetConnectedService, NetPacketsService, OrientationService, PhoneStateService, PressureService, ProximityService, ScreenService, SMSService, TemperatureService
public abstract class MetricService<T extends Comparable<T>>
extends Object
implements ObservableUpdate

Definition of abstract class for metric monitoring agents. These agents manage the monitoring of an individual metric, or a collection of metrics which are acquired through the same process. These manage the scheduling and acquisition of updated values for metrics, and provide updates to the metric management nodes (CurrentNode).

This class also provides methods for registering new periodic monitors or condition monitors.

Subclasses must define or instantiate:

  • groupId
  • metricsCount
  • freshnessThreshold
  • adminObserver
  • minInterval
  • schedules
  • values
  • valueNodes

    values and valueNodes should be the same size, index i of values should correspond to (metricId - groupId), key of valueNodes should correspond to metricId

    Author:
    chris miller

    abstract void insertDatabaseEntries()

    getMeasureCnt

    int getMeasureCnt()
    Get count of measurements for this metric group. Used only for testing purposes.

    Returns:
    count of measurements

    getMetricValue

    Object getMetricValue(int metric)
    Obtain current value of metric, or null if not currently available. Subclasses may override this to provide custom response, including fetching fresh values before returning.

    Parameters:
    metric - integer representing metric (per Metrics) to acquire
    Returns:
    current value of metric, or null if not available

    init

    protected void init()
    Initialize valid metric monitoring agents by starting metric thread, if thread is not already started. For unsupported metrics, nothing is done.

    registerClient

    public void registerClient(int metric,
                           int monitorId,
                           long period,
                           long duration,
                           boolean eavesdrop,
                           Messenger callback)
    Register a new periodic monitor.

    Parameters:
    metric - integer representing metric (per Metrics) to monitor
    monitorId - unique id of monitor, used for database logging
    period - period between updates (milliseconds), if eavesdrop is true this will represent the maximum allowable period between updates
    duration - duration to monitor (in milliseconds), 0 for continuous
    eavesdrop - if true, will provide updates as frequently as they are available due to any active monitors
    callback - messenger for client callback handler to handle periodic updates

    insertClient

    void insertClient(int metric,
                  int monitorId,
                  long period,
                  long duration,
                  boolean eavesdrop,
                  Messenger callback)
    Insert new periodic monitor into metric management node (CurrentNode). This method is called from registerClient(int, int, long, long, boolean, Messenger). Subclasses of MetricService may override this method if special action is needed to handle inserting periodic monitor.

    Parameters:
    metric - integer representing metric (per Metrics) to monitor
    monitorId - unique id of monitor, used for database logging
    period - period between updates (milliseconds), if eavesdrop is true this will represent the maximum allowable period between updates
    duration - duration to monitor (in milliseconds), 0 for continuous
    eavesdrop - if true, will provide updates as frequently as they are available due to any active monitors
    callback - messenger for client callback handler to handle periodic updates

    unregisterClient

    public void unregisterClient(int metric,
                             int monitorId)
    Unregister periodic monitor.

    Parameters:
    metric - integer representing metric (per Metrics) of registered monitor
    monitorId - unique id used to register the periodic monitor in registerClient(int, int, long, long, boolean, Messenger)
    See Also:
    registerClient(int, int, long, long, boolean, Messenger)

    removeClient

    void removeClient(int metric,
                  int monitorId)
    Remove periodic monitor from metric management node (CurrentNode). This method is called from unregisterClient(int, int). Subclasses of MetricService may override this method if special action is needed to handle removing periodic monitor.

    Parameters:
    metric - integer representing metric (per Metrics) of registered monitor
    monitorId - unique id used to register the periodic monitor in registerClient(int, int, long, long, boolean, Messenger)

    registerEvent

    public void registerEvent(int metric,
                          int monitorId,
                          Object threshold,
                          long period,
                          ExpressionNode enode,
                          boolean max)
    Register a new condition monitor.

    Parameters:
    metric - integer representing metric (per Metrics) to monitor
    monitorId - unique id of monitor, used for database logging
    threshold - threshold value to monitor for this metric
    period - maximum allowed period between updates, in milliseconds
    enode - expression node which is registering the condition
    max - true if threshold is a maximum threshold, false for minimum threshold

    insertEvent

    void insertEvent(int metric,
                 int monitorId,
                 Object threshold,
                 long period,
                 ExpressionNode enode,
                 boolean max)
    Insert new condition monitor into metric management node (CurrentNode). This method is called from registerEvent(int, int, Object, long, ExpressionNode, boolean). Subclasses of MetricService may override this method if special action is needed to handle inserting condition monitor.

    Parameters:
    metric - integer representing metric (per Metrics) to monitor
    monitorId - unique id of monitor, used for database logging
    threshold - threshold value to monitor for this metric
    period - period between updates, in milliseconds
    enode - expression node which is registering the condition
    max - true if threshold is a maximum threshold, false for minimum threshold

    unregisterEvent

    public void unregisterEvent(int metric,
                            int monitorId,
                            boolean max)
    Unregister conditional monitor.

    Parameters:
    metric - integer representing metric (per Metrics) of registered monitor
    monitorId - unique id used to register the condition
    max - true if registered threshold was maximum threshold, false if threshold was minimum threshold
    See Also:
    registerEvent(int, int, Object, long, ExpressionNode, boolean)

    removeEvent

    void removeEvent(int metric,
                 int monitorId,
                 boolean max)
    Remove condition monitor from metric management node (CurrentNode). This method is called from unregisterEvent(int, int, boolean). Subclasses of MetricService may override this method if special action is needed to handle removing condition monitor.

    Parameters:
    metric - integer representing metric (per Metrics) of registered monitor
    monitorId - unique id used to register the condition
    max - true if registered threshold was maximum threshold, false if threshold was minimum threshold

    performUpdates

    protected void performUpdates()
    Perform updates and scheduling necessary after internal update of values. This method should be called or overridden following the internal update of values by all subclasses of MetricService. For example, this may be called at the end of getMetricInfo() following the update of values.

    updateValueNodes

    protected long updateValueNodes()
    Update all active ValueNodes and return time of next update.

    Returns:
    delay before next update (in milliseconds), -1 if no active monitors remain

    scheduleNextUpdate

    protected void scheduleNextUpdate(long nextUpdate)
    Schedule next update of metric values. This method should be called by any subclasses of MetricService after updating all value nodes, if the next update time returned is positive value.

    Parameters:
    nextUpdate - delay before next update (in milliseconds), -1 if no active monitors remain

    updateObservable

    protected void updateObservable()
    Update real time values in observable object. This is used by administration app to show values in real time. This method should be called after scheduling next update by any subclasses of MetricService.

    updateObserver

    protected void updateObserver()
    Updates the real time values in observable used by administration app. This method assumes values are of type Number. If values are of another type, this method must be overridden to provide custom implementation.

    refreshObservable

    public void refreshObservable()
    Description copied from interface: ObservableUpdate
    Notify observables that a new observer has been registered. Observables should update the observable data and notify the observer accordingly.

    Specified by:
    refreshObservable in interface ObservableUpdate

    getService

    public static MetricService<?> getService(int metric)
    Static method to return instance of implementation of abstract class for the desired metric.

    Parameters:
    metric - integer representing metric (per Metrics)
    Returns:
    metric monitoring agent for this metric, null if monitoring of metric not supported on this system

    getServices

    public static List<MetricService<?>> getServices(int category)
    Returns list of metrics for a particular category.

    Parameters:
    category - category of metrics to obtain list
    Returns:
    list of metrics of type _category_
